languages.text: {n}Голоса в голове не стихают и продолжают требовать свое — и все же вы чувствуете, как ваша решимость на долю секунды колеблет этот незримый хор, заставляет сбиться на полуслове — а затем чужая воля поднимает вас и толкает к огромным вратам в центре залы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Голоса в голове не стихают и продолжают требовать свое — и все же вы чувствуете, как ваша решимость на долю секунды колеблет этот незримый хор, заставляет сбиться на полуслове — а затем чужая воля поднимает вас и толкает к огромным вратам в центре залы.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The voices in your head persist in their demands, and yet you feel this unseen chorus momentarily waver under the strength of your resolve... until the intruding influence forces you to your feet and pushes you toward the gates looming in the centre of the chamber.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Голоса в голове не стихают и продолжают требовать свое — и все же вы чувствуете, как ваша решимость на долю секунды колеблет этот незримый хор, заставляет сбиться на полуслове — а затем чужая воля поднимает вас и толкает к огромным вратам в центре залы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The voices in your head persist in their demands, and yet you feel this unseen chorus momentarily waver under the strength of your will... until the intruding influence forces you onto your feet and pushes you toward the looming gates in the centre of the chamber.{/n}

{n}The voices in your head persist in their demands, and yet you feel this unseen chorus momentarily waver under the strength of your will... until the intruding influence forces you onto your feet and pushes you toward the looming gates in the centre of the chamber.{/n}

{n}The voices in your head persist in their demands, and yet you feel this unseen chorus momentarily waver under the strength of your resolve... until the intruding influence forces you to your feet and pushes you toward the gates looming in the centre of the chamber.{/n}

{n}The voices in your head persist in their demands, and yet you feel this unseen chorus momentarily waver under the strength of your resolve... until the intruding influence forces you to your feet and pushes you toward the gates looming in the centre of the chamber.{/n}

{n}The voices in your head persist in their demands, and yet you feel this unseen chorus momentarily waver under the strength of your resolve... until the intruding influence forces you to your feet and pushes you toward the gates looming in the centre of the chamber.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你脑海中的无数声音坚持着它们的要求，然而你却感觉到，你的决心让这些声音动摇了片刻……随后，某种来自外界的影响迫使你站起身来，慢慢走向房间中央高耸的大门。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The voices in your head persist in their demands, and yet you feel this unseen chorus momentarily waver under the strength of your resolve... until the intruding influence forces you to your feet and pushes you toward the gates looming in the centre of the chamber.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你脑海中的无数声音坚持着它们的要求，然而你却感觉到，你的决心让这些声音动摇了片刻……随后，某种来自外界的影响迫使你站起身来，慢慢走向房间中央高耸的大门。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las voces de tu cabeza insisten en sus demandas, pero sientes que el coro invisible duda por un momento ante la fuerza de tu convicción... hasta que la influencia intrusiva te obliga a ponerte en pie y te lleva hacia las puertas que esperan en el centro de la sala.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The voices in your head persist in their demands, and yet you feel this unseen chorus momentarily waver under the strength of your resolve... until the intruding influence forces you to your feet and pushes you toward the gates looming in the centre of the chamber.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las voces de tu cabeza insisten en sus demandas, pero sientes que el coro invisible duda por un momento ante la fuerza de tu convicción... hasta que la influencia intrusiva te obliga a ponerte en pie y te lleva hacia las puertas que esperan en el centro de la sala.{/n}

languages.text: {n}頭の中の声は要求を主張し続けるものの、この目に見えない合唱があなたの決意の強さによって一瞬揺らぐのを感じる…押しつけがましいこの影響があなたを立ち上がらせ、部屋の中央にぼんやりと立つ門に向かってあなたを押しやるまで。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The voices in your head persist in their demands, and yet you feel this unseen chorus momentarily waver under the strength of your resolve... until the intruding influence forces you to your feet and pushes you toward the gates looming in the centre of the chamber.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの頭の中の声は要求を主張し続けるものの、それでもあなたはこの目に見えない合唱があなたの決意の強さによって一瞬揺らぐのを感じる…押しつけがましいこの影響があなたを立ち上がらせ、部屋の中央にぼんやりと立つ門に向かってあなたを押しやるまで 。{/n}
{n}頭の中の声は要求を主張し続けるものの、この目に見えない合唱があなたの決意の強さによって一瞬揺らぐのを感じる…押しつけがましいこの影響があなたを立ち上がらせ、部屋の中央にぼんやりと立つ門に向かってあなたを押しやるまで。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les voix continuent à vous assaillir mentalement de leurs demandes, mais vous sentez ce chœur invisible faiblir momentanément sous la force de votre détermination... jusqu'à ce que cette influence étrangère vous contraigne à vous lever et vous pousse vers la porte qui se dresse au centre de la pièce.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The voices in your head persist in their demands, and yet you feel this unseen chorus momentarily waver under the strength of your resolve... until the intruding influence forces you to your feet and pushes you toward the gates looming in the centre of the chamber.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les voix continuent à vous assaillir mentalement de leurs demandes, mais vous sentez ce chœur invisible faiblir momentanément sous la force de votre détermination... jusqu'à ce que cette influence étrangère vous contraigne à vous lever et vous pousse vers la porte qui se dresse au centre de la pièce.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Stimmen in deinem Kopf bestehen auf ihren Forderungen, aber du spürst dennoch, wie dieser unsichtbare Chor kurzzeitig angesichts deiner Entschlossenheit wankt ... bis der Einfluss dich doch auf die Füße zwingt und in Richtung der Tore schiebt, die sich in der Mitte der Kammer erheben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The voices in your head persist in their demands, and yet you feel this unseen chorus momentarily waver under the strength of your resolve... until the intruding influence forces you to your feet and pushes you toward the gates looming in the centre of the chamber.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stimmen in deinem Kopf bestehen auf ihren Forderungen, aber du spürst dennoch, wie dieser unsichtbare Chor kurzzeitig angesichts deiner Entschlossenheit wankt ... bis der Einfluss dich doch auf die Füße zwingt und in Richtung der Tore schiebt, die sich in der Mitte der Kammer erheben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kafandaki sesler taleplerinde ısrar etse de bu görünmeyen koronun, kararlılığının gücü altında anlık da olsa tereddüt ettiğini hissediyorsun. Ta ki zihnindeki davetsiz misafir seni ayağa kaldırıp salonun ortasında tüm heybetiyle dikilen kapılara doğru itene kadar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The voices in your head persist in their demands, and yet you feel this unseen chorus momentarily waver under the strength of your resolve... until the intruding influence forces you to your feet and pushes you toward the gates looming in the centre of the chamber.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kafandaki sesler taleplerinde ısrar etse de bu görünmeyen koronun, kararlılığının gücü altında anlık da olsa tereddüt ettiğini hissediyorsun. Ta ki zihnindeki davetsiz misafir seni ayağa kaldırıp salonun ortasında tüm heybetiyle dikilen kapılara doğru itene kadar.{/n}
